column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Great night!! I loved my evening there so much and my BF who was tired and a little apprehensive of a fancy night out
column2: said within 15 minutes of us being seated
column3: he was so glad we came. He agrees
column4: and we have hit all the biggies in the city
column7: Chicago Cut and Swift and Sons ( which we both love) but Bavettes actually left all of them including S&S and CC in the dust. I love you Bavettes!! Get ready to see me lots!!
